title: Dream travel job will pay you £25,000 to travel the world with your friends

Getting paid to travel around the world with your friends may sound like a pipe dream, but Wowcher is turning it into reality for one lucky applicant.

The vouchers website is currently hiring a Travel Ambassador to do just that; travel around the world over the space of 12 months, and get paid £25,000 for the privilege.

Oh, and you can bring a different friend along to every single destination, so no need to face the drama of choosing just one person!

You'll be travelling to 40 destinations included in Wowcher's popular Mystery Holiday deals , were brave explorers buy a £99pp holiday with flights, but only find out the destination after booking.

Previous destinations have included Amsterdam, Barcelona, Budapest, Disneyland Paris, Iceland, Pragufe, Vienna, Warsaw, as well as some long-haul hotspots including Hong Kong, Las Vegas, New York, Singapore and Bali!

(Image: Getty)

Oh, and they will pay for your travel and excursions on the trip, so there's ample opportunity to make some pretty incredible memories.

Wowcher says that it's looking for an ambassador to "create unique content documenting their globetrotting which will receive extensive coverage across Wowcher’s social channels".

So basically, you'll need strong social media skills and a passion for travel.

(Image: Getty Images)

Think you'd be perfect for the job?

To apply, you'll need to submit a 30-second video on why you feel you're the best candidate for the role. You can submit the video either on Twitter or Instagram.

You'll need to follow Wowcher on social media and tag the @Wowcher account, as well as using the hashtags #WowcherDreamJob and #WowcherMysteryHoliday.

Oh, and you'll also need to tag three friends.

Still, it feels like less effort than filling out a long job application form.

You've got a fair bit of time to create the perfect video, as the deadline for submissions is on Monday 30th December, but make sure to read the full terms and conditions before you apply.
description: Wowcher is offering up a dream travel job where you'll be paid to travel around the world and you can even bring your friends
